Column Comment.0: PRODUCTION ENTITY SUBTYPE: the type of production entity may be equal to oneof the table names of the PDEN subtype tables, such as PDEN_WELL,PDEN_COUNTY or PDEN_FIELD. Validated by check constraint.
Column Comment.1: PRODUCTION ENTITY IDENTIFIER: An identifier that is unique within a specificproduction entity source and type.
Column Comment.2: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.3: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y or N flag indicating whether this row of data is currentlyeither active/valid (Y) or inactive/invalid (N).
Column Comment.4: AREA ID: Unique identifier for any named area such as a country, province, projectarea, area of interest, offshore area, district etc.
Column Comment.5: AREA TYPE: Unique identifier for the type of area, such as country, state, AOI etc.
Column Comment.6: BUSINESS ASSOCIATE: Unique identifier for a business associate, such as aperson, company, regulatory agency, government or consortium.
Column Comment.7: CURRENT PROD STRING NAME: Name assigned to the production string: e.g., aspecial name or one derived from the name of the property with which the productionstring is associated.
Column Comment.8: CURRENT STATUS DATE: Date of the current status for the production entity.
Column Comment.9: CURRENT WELL STR NUMBER: A modifying designator assigned to a wellproduction string and may be associated with the string name; e.g., Jones # 1; B-1.
Column Comment.10: EFFECTIVE DATE: the date on which this row of data first came into effect from abusiness perspective.
Column Comment.11: ENHANCED RECOVERY TYPE: Type of method used for enhanced recovery ofpetroleum substances.
Column Comment.12: EXPIRY DATE: the date on which this row of data is no longer in effect from abusiness perspective.
Column Comment.13: FIELD IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier for the field.
Column Comment.14: LAST INJECTION DATE: The date that injection volumes were last reported for thisentity.
Column Comment.15: LAST PRODUCTION DATE: The date that production was last reported for thisentity.
Column Comment.16: LAST REPORTED DATE: The date that a production report was last submitted forthis entity.
Column Comment.17: LOCATION DESCRIPTION: The reported location of a production reporting entity.
Column Comment.18: LOCATION DESCRIPTION TYPE: The type of location description. For example -Dominion Land Survey (DLS), Congressional, or NTS.
Column Comment.19: ON INJECTION DATE: The date that injection was first reported for this entity.
Column Comment.20: ON PRODUCTION DATE: The date that production was first reported for this entity.
Column Comment.21: PDEN NAME: Name assigned to the production entity. This may be the legal orregistered name as it appears on a permit or a given name assigned by the operator.
Column Comment.22: PDEN SHORT NAME: Common short name used for the production entity.
Column Comment.23: PDEN STATUS: The operational state of the production entity.
Column Comment.24: PDEN STATUS TYPE: Identifies the type of status, such as the operational status,the financial status, the legal status, the eligibility status etc.
Column Comment.25: PLOT NAME: Name alias used when plotting the production entity on a map.
Column Comment.26: PLOT SYMBOL: A character or symbol used to represent a well. This may be used ina particular mapping package coding scheme, or as a pointer to other applicationdependent files.
Column Comment.27: POOL IDENTIFIER: Number or code uniquely identifying the pool.
Column Comment.28: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.29: PRIMARY PRODUCT: The primary product produced by this PDEN
Column Comment.30: PRODUCTION_METHOD: REFERENCE PRODUCTION METHOD: The method ofproduct ion. For example swabbing, flowing, pumping or gas lift.
Column Comment.31: PROPRIETARY INDICATOR: Indicates whether data is available for publicdistribution or viewing.
Column Comment.32: REMARK: Comments about the production entity.
Column Comment.33: STATE OR FEDERAL WATERS: Code indicating if the well is producing in state orfederal waters.
Column Comment.34: STRAT NAME SET IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier for the stratigraphic name set. Astratigraphic name set is an unordered collection of stratigraphic units, that may be inuse for a Lexicon, a geographic area, a project, a company etc.
Column Comment.35: STRATIGRAPHIC UNIT IDENTIFIER: unique identifier for the stratigraphic unit.
Column Comment.36: STRING SERIAL NUMBER: Number assigned by a regulatory agency (usually) toidentify a producing string.
Column Comment.37: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.38: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.39: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.40: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.41: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.42: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.43: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
